div.div:
Adds non-curated photo support
Adds the ability to fetch and display non-curated photos. Introduces a new data entity and associated DAO for managing these photos in the local database. Updates the data sources and repository to handle fetching and caching non-curated photos. Adds a new tab to the home screen to display the non-curated photos.

Adds home screen with curated photo list
Implements a home screen featuring a tabbed interface.
Adds curated and non-curated photo list tabs. Adds sliding animations for navigation transitions. Utilizes paging library for efficient data loading.

Adds home screen with curated photo list
Implements a home screen featuring a tabbed interface.
Adds curated and non-curated photo list tabs. Adds sliding animations for navigation transitions. Utilizes paging library for efficient data loading.

Renames String extension file
Refactors the name of the String extension file for clarity and consistency within the project.

Sets up basic navigation structure
Sets up basic navigation using Navigation3. Introduces a navigation root and a home screen. Adds composables for UI elements. Adds Koin annotations to ProGuard rules.

Handles date selection edge case
Addresses a potential crash when navigating to a month where the previously selected day doesn't exist.
Now, it defaults to the last day of the month.

Refactors mapper objects to be private
Ensures that DTO to Entity and Entity to Domain mapper objects are private to prevent unintended access and modification.
This enhances encapsulation and reduces the risk of misuse.

✨Formats month name in calendar header
Formats the month name in the calendar header to have the first letter capitalized.
This improves the user interface by presenting the month name in a more visually appealing and consistent format.

Refactors insurance provider logic
Updates insurance provider selection to use UHID instead of display name.
Corrects the assignment of logos for HDFC and Reliance insurance providers.
This change improves the accuracy and reliability of determining the insurance provider based on the provided user data.

Simplifies insurance sheet presentation.
Refactors the insurance sheet presentation by removing unnecessary modifiers. This enhances code readability and maintainability.

Implements shared element transitions
Integrates shared element transitions for smoother navigation between the Home and Profile screens.
Wraps the NavHost in a SharedTransitionLayout to enable shared transitions. The profile picture and user's name are now animated between screens providing a more engaging user experience.

sync: Improve progress tracking and visual feedback
This commit refactors the activity synchronization process and enhances the progress bar animation.
Key changes: - `ActivityRepositoryImpl`: - Improved progress updates during `syncActivitiesCustom` by calculating progress per chunk of data. - Added error logging for `syncActivitiesCustomFlow`. - `Sync.kt`: - Adjusted animation parameters for the progress bar cells for a smoother visual effect. - Introduced a distinct "loading hold" animation for the cell representing the current loading progress.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: implements Activity Calendar using a library instead of the custom implementation
This commit introduces the `ActivityCalendar` composable, a custom calendar component. It also integrates the `kizitonwose/calendar` library for enhanced calendar functionality.
Key changes include: - Added `ActivityCalendar.kt` with the new calendar composable. - Integrated `kizitonwose/calendar` library. - Updated `Home.kt` to use the new `ActivityCalendar`. - Modified `HomeViewModel.kt` to support the new calendar logic, including fetching and displaying activity graph items based on the selected date and month. - Refactored `HomeUIState` and `HomeUIAction` to accommodate the new calendar interactions. - Introduced `BasicEffect.kt` for managing side effects in composables. - Removed the `androidx.material3` dependency from `composeApp/build.gradle.kts` as it's likely provided transitively or no longer directly needed. - Renamed `CalendarCustomLayout.kt` to be within the `calendar` package.
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

feat: sync screen improvements
this is a basic setup and need further changes for a much better progress tracking

Adds Lottie animation support
Adds Compottie library and its dotlottie extension for rendering Lottie animations in the application.

Adds health insurance provider logos
Adds logos for health insurance providers (HDFC and Reliance) to the health card UI. This enhances the visual representation and branding of the insurance information. Also updates the colors used for the insurance provider display.

feat: Add insurance provider information to HealthInsuranceInfo
Signed-off-by: SarathEXP <sarathexp@gmail.com>

Refactors company serialization for ProjectDto
Updates the ProjectDto to utilize a general serializer for handling empty company objects as null, promoting code reuse and consistency. Removes the specialized serializer that was directly embedded within the ProjectDto file.

Refactors data synchronization process
Improves data synchronization by delegating sync functionalities to a dedicated repository.
Streamlines employee data fetching and storage by introducing a new method that fetches data in batches, handling potential API failures gracefully. This change ensures the application can efficiently retrieve and store a large number of employee records, improving the overall performance and reliability of the data synchronization process.
Removes direct data syncing from the previous repository to promote separation of concerns.

Adds data synchronization repository
Implements a repository for synchronizing activity data between remote and local data sources.
Introduces custom synchronization flows with progress updates. Includes logic for full and regular synchronization strategies. Handles employee data synchronization.

Adds office structure data implementation
Adds implementation for fetching and caching departments, designations, and employees using a network-bound resource pattern.
This approach fetches data from a remote source, saves it locally, and provides a consistent data source for the application.
Improves data consistency and availability.

Refactors database module for clarity
Simplifies the database module by introducing a helper function for DAO instantiation.
This improves code readability and maintainability by reducing boilerplate code in the module definition.

Adds common error conversion for Result
Extends error handling by providing a function to convert a `Result` containing a specific error type to a `Result` containing a common error type, enhancing error consistency across the application.

Refactors NetworkBoundResource for error handling
Improves error handling within NetworkBoundResource by catching exceptions during data emission.
Simplifies data processing by directly saving the API response instead of processing it separately.
Adjusts the `shouldFetch` logic to only fetch when the database data is null.

Adds local data source for office structure
Adds a local data source to handle offline access to office structure data, including departments, designations, and employees.
Implements data fetching and insertion for departments and designations.
Adds functionality to retrieve employees with filtering and pagination using Room's PagingSource.

Adds local data source for office structure
Adds a local data source to handle offline access to office structure data, including departments, designations, and employees.
Implements data fetching and insertion for departments and designations.
Adds functionality to retrieve employees with filtering and pagination using Room's PagingSource.
